title: Kyle Connor (Out of Spec Motoring, EV cannonballer)
description:
Kyle Connor is an automotive journalist who broke the EV Cannonball Record in August of 2019. He's known for testing EVs on race tracks, road trips, and in the dirt. @virtualkyle

Check out his channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/OutofSpecMotoring/featured

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/wQIH1IX_rNc
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
